Text: Sweet, thnx a bunch!!! Good to see serious research (I hope) still being done on the subject! ...Wonder where I put my blotters, hmm.
You put your blotters in an envelope and mail them to me :P

In 4 years of torrenting and after hundreds of torrents, this is the first time I really feel I need to help out and seed for a long period of time. Keeping good info out there about the relatively harmless nature of LSD is important.

I wonder how long it will be before governments stop prosecuting people who choose to put safe yet recreational chemicals into their own bodies. sigh.

eligray:

this absolutely needs to be seeded.  Thank you
